ðŸ“– Summary: Baitroute is a web honeypot library designed to detect and mislead attackers by creating realistic, vulnerable-looking endpoints. It integrates seamlessly with Go, Python, and Javascript web frameworks and offers ready-to-use rules that can be configured to create custom decoys. The library aims to provide an early warning system for potential attacks and waste attackers' time by presenting them with false positive vulnerabilities.
